text:
See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=log4cxx-user&m=116532632924890&w=2.

The log4j.dtd was not updated when support was added for rollingPolicy and triggeringPolicy elements 
which results in spurious warnings when processing validation configuration files.
creator: carnold@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text: Believe this is fixed in the current log4j 1.2 log4j.dtd.
